items.title: Is American Express Company (AXP) the Best Stock to Buy According to Billionaire Warren Buffett?
items.description: We recently published a list of 10 Best Stocks to Buy According to Billionaire Warren Buffett. In this article, we are going to take a look at where American Express Company (NYSE:AXP) stands against other best stocks to buy according to billionaire Warren Buffett.
